list_datasets.name: list_datasets
list_datasets.description: Lists all available dataset keys/names stored in the database
list_datasets.returns: String containing comma-separated list of all dataset names available in the database

describe_dataset.name: describe_dataset
describe_dataset.description: Provides a comprehensive description of the specified dataset including schema, data types, null values, and basic statistics

dataset.description: Name/key of the dataset to describe

describe_dataset.returns: String containing detailed dataset description including column names, data types, null counts, basic statistics, and dataset shape

dataset_head.name: dataset_head
dataset_head.description: Returns the first N rows of the specified dataset for data inspection and preview

dataset.description: Name/key of the dataset to preview

nrows.description: Number of rows to return from the top of the dataset

dataset_head.returns: String representation of the first nrows of the dataset in a readable format
